alert.note: Alert for Dunklin (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 4:16PM CDT until July 05 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Clay County in eastern Arkansas... East central Dunklin County in southeastern Missouri... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 416 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Greenway, or near Rector, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Kennett, Piggott, Rector, St. Francis, Greenway, Saint Francis, Nimmons, Bell City, Pratt, Hargrave Corner, Carryville, Holly Island, Rhyne, West Kennett and Leonard. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
